about_the_game: Hero of Y is an RPG centered on the growth of a hero and the choice of destiny. Players will take on the role of a hero chosen by destiny to save the continent from being eroded by evil forces in a chaotic world. The game utilizes a rich quest system and branching storyline, where every choice the player makes will affect the progress and ending of the story. The combat system combines turn-based and real-time operation, allowing players to adjust their tactics according to the enemy's weaknesses and use a variety of skills and tactics to defeat the enemy. By exploring the world, completing quests, and strengthening their characters, players will unlock new abilities, equipment, and allies, and ultimately grow into the “Hero of Y”.
detailed_description: Hero of Y is an RPG centered on the growth of a hero and the choice of destiny. Players will take on the role of a hero chosen by destiny to save the continent from being eroded by evil forces in a chaotic world. The game utilizes a rich quest system and branching storyline, where every choice the player makes will affect the progress and ending of the story. The combat system combines turn-based and real-time operation, allowing players to adjust their tactics according to the enemy's weaknesses and use a variety of skills and tactics to defeat the enemy. By exploring the world, completing quests, and strengthening their characters, players will unlock new abilities, equipment, and allies, and ultimately grow into the “Hero of Y”.
name: hero of Y
